DOC.brief_title: Fluoxetine Versus Fluoxetine Plus DU125530 Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: SSRI act block serotonin transporter ( 5-HT ) , increase availability serotonin synaptic cleft avert reuptake . The increment serotonin activate 5-HT1A presynaptic autoreceptors , result modulation release serotonin presynaptic neuron . It propose 5-HT1A receptor antagonism could accelerate clinical effect antidepressant prevent negative feedback.Preclinical data obtain selective 5-HT1A antagonist , pindolol , mice lack 5-HT1a receptor support hypothesis . Results partial antagonist ( pindolol ) conclusive accelerate SSRI . It reasonable call question whether total antagonism 5-HT1a receptor could imply rapid antidepressant response . To test hypothesis conduct double blind , randomise , control trial DU 123550 add fluoxetine 20 mg/day
DOC.criteria: Consecutive eligible patient age 18 70 Diagnosis unipolar major depression use DSMIV criterion moderate severe symptom ( score e 18 Hamilton Depression Rating ScaleHDRS 17 item ) . There washout 1 week antidepressant drug ( specifically 28 day fluoxetine ) prior enter study . Written inform consent obtain participant .
